name: SelfHelpUniversity
0:
”Alexa, open self help university”
”Alexa, ask self help university for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start self help university”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: self help university
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the latest podcast episodes from Self-Help University. Certified Life Coach Ben Povlow covers a wide range of topics related to self-improvement. He has spent the last 14 years consuming the most valuable self-help and personal-development information on the market. He has attended many seminars and conferences of the most recognizable names in self-improvement. Ben not only teaches self-help related topics but he also trains on different technology related topics. For example, some of which will include how to build your own websites, how to create your own podcast, and how to write and self-publish your first book. Tune in to see what topics you can learn more about today!

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
